description.first: Will is a web developer based in Colombia.
description.second: He builds robust, accessible UIs with React/Next.js and REST APIs with Node.js.
description.third: Currently focused on shipping real features with modern tooling.

description.first: Hello I'm Will, I'm an enthusiastic and positive Full Stack Developer. I love learning, I consider it a tool to improve and evolve. I was captivated by the I.T. world for its dynamic, constantly changing.
description.second: I started in this field by a basic programming course in #Platzi, where I did the #JavaScript school.
description.third: I like to find innovative solutions to different challenges, to work as part of a team and to contribute my technical skills, my ability to listen actively and my capacity for conciliation.

list.description: Will has completely transformed the way we launch our products! What we particularly appreciate is the attention to detail and express communication. We are really happy that the whole project was completed worry-free! Thank you, Will!
